# PED::GET_PED_HELMET_STORED_HAT_TEX_INDEX

## Summary
Returns the head prop texture which will be restored once taking off a helmet, -1 nothing is stored

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **INT**
